Cool. Those Aha! moments are the best. :)

So said  Andrew McDonagh  on  2/12/2003 --------------------

>Mostly, because of my inexperience of unit testing, this is my first
time.
>
>The light bulb above my head clicked on, when Vladimir replied
earlier.
>
>I mis-understood the use of setup & teardown, thinking they were run
per
>testcase class, not per tested method. Needless to say I re-read the
JUnit
>FAQ again.
>
>
>
>
